title: 6 injured in shooting near Clarksville club
content:
CLARKSVILLE, TN (WSMV) -
Six people are still recovering after a shooting in Clarksville over the weekend.
The victims were shot in a parking lot near El Punto’s on College Street around 2 a.m. Saturday.
One of the victims has serious injuries and is still being treated at Vanderbilt University Medical Center.
The five other victims are said to have non-life-threatening injuries.
Anyone with information about the shooting is asked to call Detective Daniel Wimmer at 931-648-0656, ext. 5527, or the Crime Stoppers Tips Hotline at 931-645-8477.
